## Populations
+ [Overpopulated and Underfed: Countries Near a Breaking Point (NY Times article)](https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2017/06/15/sunday-review/overpopulated-and-underfed-countries-near-a-breaking-point.html)
+ [Remember the Population Bomb? It’s Still Ticking (NY Times article)](https://www.nytimes.com/2017/06/15/opinion/sunday/remember-the-population-bomb-its-still-ticking.html)
+ [World population simulator:](https://www.ined.fr/en/everything_about_population/population-games/tomorrow-population/) allows you to run a global population simulator in your web browser.  Gives you the ability to adjust population parameters to see how the trajectory of the global population responds.
